sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 D, E and F are the mid-points of the sides AB, BC and CA of a \(\Delta\)ABC.
 Find the ratio of area of triangles DEF and ABC.\\ 
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "$$\text{According to question, }FE ||\text{ AB and FE }= \frac{1}{2}\text{AB}$$
	$$\Rightarrow FE || AD \text{ and } FE = \input[s1v1]{} \\$$
	$$\Rightarrow \text{FADE is a parallelogram}\\$$"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
	$$\Rightarrow \angle \input[s2v1]{} = \angle FED\\$$
	$$\Rightarrow \angle A \ of \ \Delta ABC = \angle \input[s2v2]{} \ of \ \Delta DEF.\\$$
 center{}
 tikzpicture{}"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{Similarly, }\angle B \ of \ \Delta ABC = \angle F \ of \ \Delta DEF.\\$$
 $$\Delta \input[s3v1]{} \sim \Delta CAB\\$$"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$\Rightarrow \frac{area of DEF}{area of ABC} = \frac{\input[s4v1]{} ^2}{AB^2} = \left(\frac{FE}{AB}\right)^2\\$$
 $$\Rightarrow \frac{area of DEF}{area of ABC} = \left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^2\\$$
 $$\Rightarrow area of \Delta DEF : area of \Delta ABC = 1 : \input[s4v2]{} $$ 
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["AD"], "text": "\text{Since, }AD = \frac{1}{2}\text{AB}\text{, therefore, }FE = AD$$"}, {"data": ["FAD", "E"], "text": "$$\text{From the properties of parallelogram, }\angle FAD = \angle FED\text{ which can also be written as }\angle A \ of \ \Delta ABC = \angle E \ of \ \Delta DEF.$$"}, {"data": ["DEF"], "text": "$$\text{From the angle-angle similarity \Delta DEF \sim \Delta CAB$$"}, {"data": ["FE", 4], "text": "$$\frac{area of DEF}{area of ABC} = \left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^2\text{, which upon simplification, we get } area of \Delta DEF : area of \Delta ABC = 1 : 4$$"}]
